nodes.text: Kirbat, also known as Kirbat the Unready was an individual who worked as a chancellor. During Kirbat's chancellorship, a polysteel statue of the Tionese Despot Xim was constructed in a factory on the planet Centares. The Historian Bleys Harand mentioned Kirbat and the statue in his work Travels Amid Strange Stars, which focused on finding an accurate depiction of Xim.

Kirbat was first mentioned in 2013 in the third instalment of Star Wars: The Essential Guide to Warfare Author's Cut, a series of posts on the StarWars.com blog featuring material cut from The Essential Guide to Warfare. The post was written by Jason Fry and Paul R. Urquhart and did not make clear Kirbat's gender, species or where and when Kirbat was chancellor.
